channel.title: RuneXScape | PvM | Dicing | Eco | Custom Items | Active staff | Join Now!
channel.description:
[img]http://gyazo.com/52a3c24936c50b843539b7b5d06523d5.png[/img]
Website: http://rune-x-scape.net/index.html Forums: http://runex.enjin.com/ Play now on the website: http://runex.enjin.com/webclient Download the desktop Client: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/38535602/rune-x-server/RXS%201.8.jar Vote for the server for more players: http://www.rune-x-scape.net/vote
Features:
Custom NPC's: Pikachu (drops crystal keys) Custom Items: Wings, Santas, Phats, Spirit Shields, etc Custom Home Vote4Items System Auto Donation System Active Forums Active Community Active Staff Members Active Updates 24/7 NO LAG DDOS Protection for both Website + Server Active Minigame adventures Active Boss adventures Easy to get rich Fun to play Skype Group Calls - Create friends Custom Bosses Duel Arena Fun Pk Skilling Server Mystery Boxes for Voting Skill Point Store Donator Point Store Leet Point Store/System Easy Dungeoneering System Brand new 2014 custom sets
Many More!
